title: Part 400 - Independent Dispute Resolution for Emergency Services and Surprise Bills
content:
Part 400 - Independent Dispute Resolution for Emergency Services and Surprise Bills

State Regulations
§ 400.0 - Preamble
§ 400.1 - Applicability
§ 400.2 - Definitions
§ 400.3 - Independent dispute resolution entity (IDRE) certification requirements
§ 400.4 - Conflict of interest
§ 400.5 - Responsibilities of health care plans for disputes regarding emergency services and surprise bills
§ 400.6 - Responsibilities of physicians, hospitals, and non-participating referred health care providers for disputes regarding emergency services and surprise bills
§ 400.7 - Process to submit disputes regarding emergency services or surprise bills
§ 400.8 - Responsibilities of an IDRE
§ 400.9 - IDRE record retention and compliance
§ 400.10 - Payment for the independent dispute resolution

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
